product_description: This slim sneaker features handcrafted details that are not lost in the simplicity of the design.
product_details_and_care:
This slim sneaker features handcrafted details that are not lost in the simplicity of the design. Designed with a Soft-Air Technology insole and flexible sole, this sneaker features a cap toe that beautifully contrasts with the rest of the silhouette.
Lace-up style
Removable, cushioned insole with arch supprt
Leather upper and lining/rubber sole
Made in Portugal
Women's Shoes
Item #5952030_1
